questions.question: What counts as an "asset"?
questions.answer: An asset is any piece of equipment you're tracking. This includes heavy machinery, tools, vehicles, containers - anything with a QR code attached. Each asset uses one slot in your plan.

questions.question: How does the Excel import work?
questions.answer: Simply upload your existing equipment spreadsheet (Excel or CSV). Our smart column detection automatically identifies fields like Serial Number, Asset Name, Location, Purchase Date, etc. No manual mapping required. You can import 500 assets in about 5 minutes.

questions.question: Can I generate QR codes in bulk?
questions.answer: Yes! Select any number of assets and generate all QR codes as a single print-ready PDF in seconds. The PDF is formatted for easy printing on standard label sheets (30 labels per page, 6x5 grid).

questions.question: What is VGP compliance?
questions.answer: VGP (Vérification Générale Périodique) is mandatory equipment inspection in France. TraviXO automates inspection tracking, sends alerts before deadlines, and generates DIRECCTE-ready reports. One missed inspection can cost €15K+ in fines.

questions.question: Can I change plans later?
questions.answer: Yes, upgrade or downgrade anytime. If you upgrade mid-month, we'll prorate the difference. If you downgrade, the new rate applies at your next billing cycle.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes! All new customers get a 2-month free trial with up to 100 assets. No credit card required. After the trial, choose the plan that fits your fleet size.

questions.question: Where is my data stored?
questions.answer: All data is hosted in EU datacenters (France) with full GDPR compliance. We never store data outside the EU.

questions.question: What's the typical ROI?
questions.answer: Most customers see 500-1,300% ROI. For a €5M fleet, preventing 1-2% losses (€50k-€100k), avoiding VGP fines (€15k+), and reducing audit costs (€15k+) totals €80k-€170k annual value for €9k-€30k investment.
